isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Bunk Speakers With PRO SLEEPER

svcsubproc.title: Without Headset Jack
svcsubproc.para: Audio power is fed to the left bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AR/86AB and 86AS/86AC. Audio power is fed to the right bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AU/86AP and 86AT/86AE. Audio power is then fed to the left bunk speaker on circuits 86AW and 86AX. Audio power is fed to the right bunk speaker on circuits 86AY and 86AZ.

svcsubproc.title: With Headset Jack
svcsubproc.para: Audio power is fed to the volume control and speaker in the same circuits that are used for the volume control without headset described above in Without Headset Jack. A different volume control panel is utilized for the headset control.
When headphones are plugged into the headset jack, the speakers are switched out of the circuit and the headphones are connected along with additional resistance and capacitance.
